inclusion.criterion: Depression score; MDI ≥ 15 WHO 5: score < 50 arbitrary units
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: User feedback addressing the educational program, conduction of the program at home, the professional support and the web related support.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Provider feedback among the professional staff taking care of education and professional support
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of insulin as basal-bolus regime (i,.e. the combination of long-term acting insulin as basal insulin and short-term lasting insulin as bolus injections before meals)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
